text: This information includes, but is not limited to, anonymous data about your feature and plugin usage, hardware and software configuration, file type statistics, and the number of files per project. No personal data or sensitive information, such as source code or file names, is shared with us. Learn more here.

By subscribing, I understand JetBrains s.r.o. will process my email address for this purpose in accordance with the Privacy Policy. I can withdraw my consent at any time in privacy settings in the JetBrains account.
printableName: Send me EAP-related feedback requests and surveys

text: To measure and improve integration with JetBrains AI, we can collect non-anonymous information about its usage, which includes the full text of inputs sent by the IDE to the large language model and its responses, including source code snippets.
printableName: Allow detailed data collection by JetBrains AI

text: This includes an expanded range of IDE data with associated code snippets, such as AI feature usage, run configurations, and terminal commands. This data will be used for product improvement and model training purposes. Find more details here.
